abstract: It seems the rumors that Apple’s chief operating officer, Tim Cook, was ditching his job at the company to take the top post at Hewlett-Packard were just that: rumors.
snippet: It seems the rumors that Apple’s chief operating officer, Tim Cook, was ditching his job at the company to take the top post at Hewlett-Packard were just that: rumors.
lead_paragraph: It seems the rumors that Apple‘s chief operating officer, Tim Cook, was ditching his job at the company to take the top post at Hewlett-Packard were just that: rumors.

headline.main: Apple Shares Slide as Rumor Mill Strikes Again
